p: Severe hypoxic condition (anoxia) was set by flushing the hypoxia chambers with a gas mixture of âˆ¼0.2 % oxygen (replaced with 94.9 % nitrogen) and 5.1 % carbon dioxide [ 13], while normoxia chambers were maintained at 18.0 % oxygen and 5.1 % carbon dioxide and 76.9 % nitrogen, with a pressure of 1.75 bar for both conditions.
